casebody.data:
No. 09-9773. Steven Kent Bloom, Petitioner v. Kathleen Selzer-Lippert, et al. 560 U.S. 901, 130 S. Ct. 3293,

176 L. Ed. 2d 1179,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 4090. May 17, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Kansas dismissed. See Rule 39.8.

Same case below, 214 P.3d 1226.
